description: Triangle T(n,k) giving exponent of power of 2 dividing entry (n,k) of trinomial triangle A027907.
references: B. A. Bondarenko, Generalized Pascal Triangles and Pyramids (in Russian), FAN, Tashkent, 1990, ISBN 5-648-00738-8. English translation published by Fibonacci Association, Santa Clara Univ., Santa Clara, CA, 1993; see p. 117.
maple: with(numtheory): T := proc(i,j) option remember: if i >= 0 and j=0 then RETURN(1) fi: if i >= 0 and j=2*i then RETURN(1) fi: if i >= 1 and j=1 then RETURN(i) fi: if i >= 1 and j=2*i-1 then RETURN(i) fi: T(i-1,j-2)+T(i-1,j-1)+T(i-1,j): end: for i from 0 to 20 do for j from 0 to 2*i do if T(i,j) mod 2 = 1 then printf(`%d,`,0) else printf(`%d,`, ifactors(T(i,j))[2,1,2] ) fi: od:od: # _James A. Sellers_, Feb 22 2001
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 22 2001
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Feb 22 2001
